text:
e="preserve">William John Olner (9 May 1942 – 18 May 2020) was a British Labour Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Nuneaton from 1992 until 2010. He had been Leader of Nuneaton Borough Council. He was born in Atherstone, Warwickshire.
Olner died of COVID-19 at a hospital in Nuneaton, Warwickshire on 18 May 2020, at age 78.
